text: Rwose abavuze ko Mesiya (Yesu) mwene Mariyamu (Mariya) ari Imana, barahakanye. Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Ni nde wagira ububasha bwo kubuza Allah aramutse ashatse kurimbura Mesiya mwene Mariyamu, nyina, ndetse n’abari ku isi bose?” Kandi ubwami bw’ibirere n’ubw’isi n’ibiri hagati yabyo, ni ibya Allah. Arema icyo ashaka. Kandi Allah ni Ushobora byose
